revised_title: A New Reflecting Mirror for Focusing Sunlight
tldr: In this letter, Mr. Turberville Needham and M. de Buffon describe a new reflecting mirror that can focus sunlight and ignite combustible materials at a distance of 66 feet. The mirror consists of 140 small mirrors arranged in a square frame and can be adjusted to align solar images. The invention has potential for further improvements and applications.
